website_summaries.verdict: Although the hold is lighter than other gels on our list, this product earns high marks for natural ingredients, nice scent, and moisturizing ability.
pros: Garners praise from parents who prefer natural products
Vegan formula contains no harsh chemicals or sulfates
Contains aloe vera that protects and moisturizes
Scent is natural, light and pleasant
A perfect gel for babies and toddlers
cons: Consistency is on the thin side, and may not work on hard-to-hold hair

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great. I use it to slick back my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I use it to slick back my daughters hair in an effort to annoy my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money it does not work
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money it does not work!!! 10 minutes after applying it’s like I never styled my sons hair. I’ve tried this gel with water and without, makes no difference this stuff did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on straight, fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old has fine and very straight hair, and this product unfortunately does not hold his hair in place after combing it, even after wetting his hair. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when my grandson's hair was a bit long on top. He's 17 months old and has a full head of hair. I wanted something to keep his hair to the side for a while, or when is shorter, spiked in a messy style on top. It worked great. None sticky and does not leave a residue. Primarily I bought it because i like that is natural and has vitamin B5 which is great for the hair. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: NO adverse reaction to this (my poor son has VERY sensitive skin and reacts to many ...
customer_reviews.text: NO adverse reaction to this (my poor son has VERY sensitive skin and reacts to many products)! This is a "light hold" so it'll hold through the first part of the day, but one must consider that my son is VERY active - he runs through the house, sweats, typical 5 year old boy full of energy...that said, unless I poured glue on his head not certain anything would hold all day :)
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Gel for Your Babes!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old son has very unruly curly hair (like his daddy did!) We bought this when we knew we were going to see Santa and wanted our little dude to look spiffy. He didn't have too high of hopes considering his hair is just crazy! But this gel amazed us, it slicked his hair right down and it stayed for hours without being sticky or crunchy. My husband just smeared it on with his hands and I brushed it down and boom picture perfect hair. I would highly recommend this as my son's skin is pretty sensitive and this didn't bother him at all. It was easy to wash out, no residue. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Kahls

customer_reviews.title: Great product for babies
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 11 month old’s mop hair! It’s not sticky at all. I only use a little bit and it holds his hair back without being stiff or hard. It holds up pretty well for a few hours (again, I don’t use a lot so I’m sure it would hold longer if I applied more product) and doesn’t leave behind any residue. It comes with a little tips and tricks pamphlet which I found to be really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my baby/toddler's hair. I didn't want to use something with chemicals. This is reasonably priced and easy to use. Just follow the directions when it says it's better to use on wet hair. Makes it easier to style. Hair lasts but if my son get sweaty or wet then it kind of gets messed up but that's okay with me since I don't want something with harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter to help with the fly aways. She has extra sensitive skin, so this seemed like the best bet. About twenty minutes after putting her hair in a ponytail and using this, she had just as many flyways as if I hadn’t used any product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults, doesn't leave "gunk" in hair
customer_reviews.text: We love this hair gel - it has a medium strength hold, so lasts part of the day, but most importantly, it doesn't leave a disgusting residue in the hair, so you don't necessarily need to wash hair after using this. I will continue to buy this and our whole family is using it now! Also - NO smell, which is a great bonus, since so many of these hair products are super-perfumy!
customer_reviews.author: Georg Rafailidis

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I could've just purchased aloe vera for a $1 at Walgreens. That's pretty much what this product is. It doesn't even work that well.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold as well as I would hope
customer_reviews.text: This will hold a toddler's hair for about 20 min. Super light weight and organic so it is as advertised. But It holds barely longer than wet water. Got us through styling for our Christmas card photo, but for price I wouldn't waste my money to buy again
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Light

customer_reviews.title: zero rating and not effective
customer_reviews.text: The strong smell of chemicals and carcinogen ingredients make me think this item should be banned from the kid's category. They claim it's natural but is not. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: JC and Ali

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be purchasing this again
customer_reviews.text: Waaay over priced for the amount and light weight hold. Also has some questionable ingredients for a product that is being marketed as “chemical free”
customer_reviews.author: Ruled by Venus

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong hold on thick hair
customer_reviews.text: VERY light weight. Only enough hold while your put it on and pick up hair or do whatever. Then as it dries most of the hold goes away and a tiny bit stays. I used it for my sons long hair and he has Alot. Maybe this product is better for babies who have hair but not a full thick head. It kept his fly aways tamed and help me do his man bun or his side swept hair but as it dried it would not really be a strong gel hold
customer_reviews.author: Diana Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my kids' hair. It's definitely only for a light hold, but that's exactly what they advertise it as. I don't care for anything scented and this smells very natural. Sometimes even unscented things can have a scent (kind of a chemical-y smell) but this doesn't at all. The ingredients are safe which is what I care most about. Gets a thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The hold is so light there is no hold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for my 8mo son’s hair. It is light weight but it’s too lightweight in the sense that it’s like putting nothing on his hair. He doesn’t have a lot of hair and it’s straight but the gel didn’t hold at all. Plus it’s quite a little bottle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and recommend it as a neurotically picky parent. It holds all day, starting with a wet spikey look, and when i pick him up from school it is still spikey but dry and soft. There is no gummy residue (im looking at you LA Looks) or odor. I havent found any product better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Decent hold, but rubs off after time
customer_reviews.text: Great little gel for my toddler boy. The only reason why not five stars is that it seems to rub off after a while even when I use more of it than I should (aka my son resembles Johnny Bravo). I like the lack of chemicals. I think once I get the amount right I will like it more. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mariperse

customer_reviews.title: I love that it isn’t filled with chemicals and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in my toddler daughter’s hair. She will not wear her hair up and I don’t want to cut it so we use it to keep her hair out of her face. I love that it isn’t filled with chemicals and that it is really easy on her sensitive skin and the hair doesn’t look greasy. My only negative review of the gel is that it really only lasts for a few hours and we have to use a lot to make it work. It costs a lot for a little bit of gel.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria wing

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: This gel is OK. I'll use it up but probably won't buy it again. I love that its natural and doesn't contain chemicals however it doesn't have much hold. To get any hold I have to use soooo much and still it doesn't last through the day. My son has a lot of wavy/curly hair. It definily defines his curls, but when I want to do a Mohawk style on him, it doesn't really last. Its an OK product. If u want a really light hair gel and your kid doesn't have that much hair this is probably for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with long hair
customer_reviews.text: Our son has very long hair for an 8 month old. Even with having a haircut his hair is out of control majority of the time. This product works great in his hair and doesn’t make it look or feel greasy or hard. Easy to wash out at the end of the day as well and there is no smell to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Ashley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2.5 year old. Didn’t hold his hair in place. Tried it a couple times with his hair being damp. It also has a gross smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ems

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great, and I love that it's chemical free!!!
customer_reviews.text: Little Roseberry hair gel for kids was exactly what I've been searching for to use on my 5 year old son who has very difficult hair! I wanted something effective, but without all of the harsh chemicals found in most other hair gels. I simply put a little bit of Little Roseberry gel on his hair in the morning and it stays down and in place for hours and is still soft and manageable. He really likes the smell of it and the cute bottle. Thank you for providing a great product that is safe for kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Good Gel Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help hold my child's bangs out of their face. It works and does what it's supposed to but doesn't last that long. We have to reapply every hour or so. This isn't that big of a deal for a gel that doesn't have chemicals in it for babies. It works good enough for us and did the job as needed but as he got older we needed a stronger gel. It's best to apply and comb it or else the child's hair will just look like they're sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Mytu

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try and have some control of my baby girls hair, started using it when she was about 1.5 and still use it now. It’s not a strong hold at all, but she’s a kid, so she really doesn’t need perfect hair. I just use this to flatten down her fly aways and help with her part
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia McCormick Burns

customer_reviews.title: Light hold.
customer_reviews.text: Light hold. My sons hair is long and straight and I was looking for something to keep his hair out of his face... this doesn’t have much of a hold for us but I’m sure if your child’s hair isn’t as long then it would probably work for you. Not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Eli’s-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too little product for the money and it doesn't hold. Love that its toxin free but still very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: good intentions, doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I could see that using an aloe based product is great for children, but the product doesn't do what it's intended to do. After putting the product in my son's hair, it'll become wet and manageable but within a half-hour, the product disappears and his hair isn't holding.
customer_reviews.author: Anet Danielyan

customer_reviews.title: No hold
customer_reviews.text: Might as well use water. Does not hold my son’s hair back anymore as soon as it dries.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: You can find better for less money
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. It doesn’t hold very long. I bought it when it was $13 and I thought it was a bit pricy for the quality of the product. Now it’s $18 and that’s just ridiculous for something that barely works. Plus I’ve only had the bottle for a month, and I use a dime size amount probably twice a week and it’s already gone. Will definitely not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. You don't immediately run to the sink to ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. You don't immediately run to the sink to wash it off your hands after doing your child's hair and you can work with it without it thickening up before you're done styling
customer_reviews.author: LB87

customer_reviews.title: This gel is made with natural ingredients... not chemicals!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kids hairgel we have ever used! Ive been telling all my friends who are parents that the have to get this for their kids!! It’s not watered down like most others and is made with natural ingredients like aloe Vera juice, pro-vitamin b5, and witch hazel! The other hair gels I’ve used in the past are made of chemicals that I can’t even pronounce.... and I feel good knowing this product is safe and non-toxic. And it works great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NorCal Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works for me; not my daughter really
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really work for my 9 month old daughter, but it actually works pretty well with my really fine/thin hair. For my daughter, I wanted it to help with putting up in barrettes (her hair is so long), but it doesn't really work for that. For my hair, it makes it look thicker. The only thing I don't like about it for me is it makes it more tangled after I put it on and the next day if I wet it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha B. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Good gel
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light weight. Looks nice when on. Easy to use. Not really recommended for a 2 year old. After 30 minutes of playing you cant tell it was even in. I like that it doesnt leave any residue in the hair though. Great for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Q

customer_reviews.title: Sure, I'd buy again.although not a fan of smell
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does its job .holds very well for a "light hold" product. I really like the ingredients its made of. But the smell, well I want to say it smells like nothing but i get hints of plastic I'm assuming it's because of the bottle it is in? Only reason I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak hold
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold well at all. Someone said it held his son's faux-hawk all day. I can't imagine how that happened. Nevertheless if you're looking for something with no chemicals for your infant (this isn't good enough for a child) it's better than nothing. Definitely over priced tho
customer_reviews.author: Elly Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love! No hard hair, no chemical smell, holds pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I will say - my son has thicker hair so we have to use more than recommended to get a good hold, but even when using a lot it still doesn’t cause hair to get hard like other gels. No strong smell, definitely has an aloe Vera texture. If we apply early morning, it’s starting to lose its hold by 3pm or so but for something safe for my son’s head, I’m totally ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Doesn't have any scent, which I prefer. I use it on my kids. Not sticky and not greasy. Because of the natural or friendly ingredients, I really like it. It is pricier than I'd like it to be and it's a small container but I will still buy another one when we are done with the current one.
customer_reviews.author: laszlovna

customer_reviews.title: It advertises a light hold...
customer_reviews.text: And indeed, it's a light hold. Don't expect anything more than the lightest of holds. Basically, it can be used to minimally hold a part in the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product is just like using water. It will get the hair to stay down when you are for styling it but once it dries it does not hold at all.
customer_reviews.author: dcny

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as Light Hold
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light hold. Once my son starts rocking out, which he loves to do, it’s over. His hair is back to being in his face. With these baby products though it’s to be expected. Smells great and doesn’t leave any white residue in his hair. The pump can be locked shut easily with a twist, so you can toss it in your bag for as many touch-ups on the go your little one may need.
customer_reviews.author: GeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is safe for babies. My baby has lots of (uncontrollable) hair! And this stuff really helped me keep it out of his face and eyes. It tends to not hold all day so sometimes I have to reapply it, but I love it nonetheless! If safe-for-kids means it's not as strong as, say, hairspray, then reapplying it is a small process to pay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IM OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: Having something not only work but all natural was very important to me. My son's spikes last all day (even through nap-time). I'll never use another product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, I use this on my 7month old, just to comb over his hair and it seems to stay put for hours. I think it works as a very gentle hold.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra k

customer_reviews.title: Love this non toxic hair gel!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this natural hair gel for my kids! I use it on my baby boy for a cute spike, my daughter to tame down her wispies and scrunch her curls, and my 6 yr old son for a messy hair look. Love that it's chemical free and isn't toxic. FYI my son comes from a 7 hour day at school and his hair is still styled, it's just soft hair. Even when the gel is just freshly dryed, it's not "stiff" and we like that.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R. Pittard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little hair gel. Love that it's organic and I don't have to worry about what kind of chemicals are going on my one year old boys hair. His hair gets wild. His dad doesn't want me to cut it until it curls so I needed this to keep it under control. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LKayS

customer_reviews.title: buying again
customer_reviews.text: His hair is still soft but sleeked down and his lil mohawk look juicy. it doesnt hold the sides down it slicks it down just enough to take pics or to church. Once you put the baby in the car seat it ruffles back up. He is 5 months now and i dont need anything to cause dryness and more on the natural side.
customer_reviews.author: Minny Vanqu

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This works so great on my son's hair! I love the fact that it is all natural! I have been using it on his hair for a year now. We first used it when he was 6 months old
customer_reviews.author: JPrice

customer_reviews.title: A little too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff bc you can tell it’s natural and not a bunch of chemicals. But it barely lasts an hour.
customer_reviews.author: David Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but doesn't stay in place ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is chemical-free. But it is a very, very light hold. I wish it stayed in place a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3103

customer_reviews.title: Holds the best out of others I have tried for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Holds the best out of others I have tried for toddlers... I bought another brand that was like a cream and free of chemicals for over $20 and holds for like an hour and seems to disappear.. This one is easy to style and has a hold for most of the day...
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: You can’t win them all.  Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t provide needed hold. It’s nice that it’s less toxic, but would be nicer still if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey b

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my two year olds. Enough hold to spike their hair up but not too sticky. Easily washes out at bath time. Plus I feel good about it being natural ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Clint G

customer_reviews.title: 99] and not have a solution to swap the product out is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I had HIGH HOPES for this product. Unfortunately, the gel does not hold well for a toddler. Using a small or large amount does not impact overall 'hold'. When the product was received, it was damaged at the pump and with product leaking out into the shipping package. I contacted Little Roseberry's customer support and they were quick to respond and send a new pump but did not respond to resolve the leaking issue from the original pump. It is a small bottle and there was a significant amount of lost product. To pay what I would consider a premium for a child's hair product [$14.99] and not have a solution to swap the product out is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really curly hair, this really helps smooth it out. We have to clip her hair back and apply the gel but when we remove the clip hours later her hair is a lot straighter. Probably as straight as I've seen it since she was an infant.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised how good this works! It holds my son’s hair up all day, however the parts where I want flat some of the hairs will start to unstick and stand up unless I apply more. He doesn’t have a whole lot of hair but it’s enough to have fun styling with this gel. Not every child’s hair will respond well to this product but it works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: Works but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s light weight and doesn’t make my baby‘s hair white ,but its way too small for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: You will need to buy it often.
customer_reviews.text: I like it the hold is good if I use a genorous amount but it’s not worth using since I have to use more and the bottle is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: ACC2011

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son has a curly hair, it’s a great get to style his hair with. Super light
customer_reviews.author: rama

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son who has sensitive skin, he loves it! A little goes a long way! Great for adults too, I have even used it! Not greasy, doesn't weigh hair down, great for a light hold and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Princessmary

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple texture this gel adds to my sons hair. The simple ingredients also make me feel so much better about using it! For reference my son has pretty thin light hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bayleigh rose

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic but hold does not last
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s not toxic but unfortunately the holding power is very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Val

customer_reviews.title: Get your hair did
customer_reviews.text: My two year old girl loves it and it’s really good. We were alil scared of buy it but it does keep my daughter hair nice and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Josue Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a hairy little 7 month old. Its not yet long enough for clips and rubber bands. This product helps keep her fine baby hair in a "general direction" rather than all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for kids hair!
customer_reviews.text: i don't usually like putting gel on my son cause it leaves his hair icky flaky afterwards so i searched for gel for kids that's more on organic and this showed up i like that it's made from aloe vera so after shower he can put it right away without me worrying that can damage his hair!
customer_reviews.author: Elise D. Dela Rosa

customer_reviews.title: We're hoot, but it's not real gel as it should be!
customer_reviews.text: This "gel" works great for our 1 year old. We've been using for months now. It's not regular gel as that shouldn't be on a baby, so don't expect it to be so strong. It does keep his hair more together though. Helps the stragglers :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Birro

customer_reviews.title: Feels natural but does the job for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my 15months olds hair out of his eyes. I like how it feels natural and doesn't gunk up! Pretty happy with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Y. A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. It didn’t keep the hold for longer than an hour. Totally wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: AThorne5

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Won't repurchase, even though it does not leave residue it does not have a good hold on my two year old daughter hair. Not want I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: IDJ

customer_reviews.title: I love the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients, but “light hold” really is a light hold... like, it will hardly hold up against a gentle breeze. But if that’s what you’re going for, then it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Hair in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and when I went to open it to smell it there’s a hair in the bottle....how disgusting...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, holds one year old hair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product for my one year. It smell like rose water. Product stayed on hair until the next day. Make sure to add more product depending on how you’re styling the hair. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my baby’s hair, light hold and doesn’t damage my baby’s hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn’t have a strong smell. It doesn’t hold hair for long thought (used on a toddler boy with short hair to keep it to the side)
customer_reviews.author: nmc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the kiddos and gentle on the hair
customer_reviews.author: Chloep5

customer_reviews.title: Smells delish and comes out of hair easily without even
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong hold but didn’t expect one since is made for babies without chemicals. Smells delish and comes out of hair easily without even washing
customer_reviews.author: Tat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has natural ingredients and it doesn't leave my baby's hair super stiff. It also doesn't make my hands all sticky when applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Elia Demerutis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler with gorgeous yet unruly curls! I can wet her hair, brush it out and crunch it up with this gel and it looks great, just enough hold without looking stiff or leaving behind any residue. I'll definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sayward813

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted when buying hair gel for 1 yr old. Natural ingredients and no shiny stiff hair! Helps tame his crazy hair, but keeps it soft and looking natural!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I needed a product that wasn’t full of chemicals to tame my sons hair and this product is amazing! It’s not clumpy and hard like most gels are! It did it’s job and it didn’t even look like my son had anything in his hair! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 6 month old’s faux hawk perfectly! Stays in until the next day but doesn’t have that gel look to it. Hair is soft to the touch!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Dovi

customer_reviews.title: No smells or chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my little one! He is three months
customer_reviews.author: Renovacion Carismatica

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My 15 month old daughter is in an awkward hair stage and this is the only thing that’s keeping her hair out of her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Volgirl

customer_reviews.title: What a joke! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest disappointment. When I first opened it I was stunned at how small the bottle was-Especially for $15! Still, I hoped it would work. Ha! Ha! Ha! That was funny. No. It did next to nothing. My daughter has very fine, soft hair and it couldn’t even hold that. In the pictures, the smiley face pic was taken 5 minutes after I did her hair. The other two were 15 minutes later. I might as well have thrown $15 in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Hold is too light
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's natural, but it was not strong enough of a hold.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work very well for my LO. It didn't hold his hair down and was very sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Moran

customer_reviews.title: We love this! It keeps my son’s hair in place ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It keeps my son’s hair in place without making it stiff. We have been using this on him since shortly after his first birthday, and feel good about the natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did what was supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: My daughters hair held all day. Will definitely be buying more. Wish it had a scent but then again it’s for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Bejar

customer_reviews.title: not all day
customer_reviews.text: We are constantly buying it. easy to use. it holds but not all day.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gel , super light weight and it works on my 13month old hair. She has curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mikia Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's good for keeping flyaways in place
customer_reviews.text: It's good for keeping flyaways in place...until my one year old rubs his head with his hand or against anything else. Not too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We really like the chemical free gel for kids hair. It holds well, but it also has a natural look. It’s clear in color, and doesn’t have a strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to harsh hair gels.
customer_reviews.text: Liked how it doesn't have harsh chemicals. A little bit goes a long way, it doesn't hold all day, but it is good enough for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: VickyGee

customer_reviews.title: Natural hair gel really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this hair gel. I use it for both of my boys hair and I love it! It's not super sticky or gooey and to know that it is a natural product and doesn't have harmful chemicals is a bonus! Thank you for making a safe alternative for hair gel for my boys! They like having "cool" hair! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Madison Berry✌🏼

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works ok on my 18 month old boy who has long hair. I think it will work better once it gets a certain length. I would recommend it though, it doesn’t smell or feel sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great hair gel for your little ones!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome hair gel for your little ones. It is not a super firm hold which is great because what little person wants crusty hair! Instead it provides a light hold and by the end of the day you won't even know you put gel in so they can sleep without having to wash it out. I have tried other gels due to the price but keep coming back to this one! Worth the money in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Takes too much product to really hold hair, I understand that it is because it doesn't have typical chemicals, overall its ok
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: The best! I’m thinking of using it for myself.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best. It says light hold but actually holds amazing. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for styling
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky and easy to style for a little bit. Don’t buy if you are looking to more hold. I wasn’t for my son so I’m completely satisfied with what it does.
customer_reviews.author: sushovan

product_meta.title: Hair Gel for Kids | Light Hold | Chemical Free | Made with Organic Aloe Vera and Vitamins | Safe on Babies, Toddlers, Men and Women | Always Paraben, Sulfate & Fragrance Free | Made in USA (1 Unit)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Little Roseberry Hair Gel is made with Organic Aloe Vera Juice and Witch Hazel to promote hair wellbeing. Our Hair Gel for kids offers a gentle formula packed with vitamins to protect delicate hair. Our organic Hair Gel works for kids all ages! Light Hold Gel, perfect for the whole family!. Natural Hair Gel for men, that will not promote hair loss. 100% Toxin-free (No parabens, Sulfates), Vegan and cruelty-free. When we say fragrance and dye-free, we absolutely mean it! You won't find any nasty chemicals that leave behind dry, greasy or sticky build up, as compared to other top name brands. Why you would love it? - WE DON'T DILUTE OUR PRODUCTS WITH WATER - Little Roseberry Hair Gel is made with Organic Aloe Vera Juice, instead of diluting them with water. 90% of the Top Name Brands dilute all of their products with water. - ORGANIC ALOE VERA - Aloe Vera Juice promotes hair growth and reduces hair shed. It contains Antioxidants, Vitamins and Minerals. - NATURAL - Our Hair gel was created with natural ingredients, always paraben and sulfate free. Created by an award winner mom-cosmetologist. - PERFECT FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - Natural hair Gel for boys and girls that works great for the whole family. A hair Gel for men that will not make him bold. Perfect to use on girls hair to prevent flyaways and create braids. - SAY NO! TO CHEMICAL HAIR GELS - Little Roseberry hair gel for kids is made with natural ingredients and vitamins to promote hair wellbeing. Compared to the brand name hair gels such as crew hair gel or axe hair gel, that are made with chemicals, Little Roseberry Aloe vera hair gel prevents hair shed and brings harmony to scalp. - BABY SAFE - Our kids Hair gel is the safest baby hair gel.
feature_bullets: Natural Hair Gel for Kids Made with Aloe Vera
